name: Carsome Group Inc.
description: Operator of an online car-selling platform intended to connect customers to used car dealers. The company offers a range of services that include car inspection, ownership transfer to financing as well as offers a curated selection of cars to individuals who wish to buy pre-owned cars, enabling customers to sell cars within a day with no fee and no hassle.
one_liner: Operator of an online car-selling platform intended to connect customers to used car dealers. The company offers a range of services that include car inspection, ownership transfer to financing as well as offers a curated selection of cars to individuals who wish to buy pre-owned cars, enabling customers to sell cars within a day with no fee and no hassle.
